@mhubii Not quite, that wouldn't always have an effect because you're changing the options after the Conv2d is created. The idea is to construct the Options object via chaining and pass it to the constructor of Conv2d:

torch::nn::Conv2d conv(torch::nn::Conv2dOptions(3, 16, 5).stride(2).padding(2));

Sorry that wasn't clear. I will write some more tutorials for this.
